name: tunes
description: A HyperHTML version of PeepCode's Tunes
author: Djalma Jr. <djalmajr@gmail.com>

scripts.add-script: sed -i '/<!-- scripts -->/ r dist/script.txt' dist/index.html && rm dist/script.txt
scripts.add-script-dev: echo '<script src="../src/index.js" type="module"></script>' > dist/script.txt && npm run add-script
scripts.add-script-prod: echo '<script src="bundle.js"></script>' > dist/script.txt && npm run add-script
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run add-script-prod && npm run build-css && npm run build-es2015 && npm run build-js && rm -rf es2015
scripts.build-css: npm run concat-css && npm run uglify-css && rm dist/style.css && mv dist/style.min.css dist/style.css
scripts.build-js: echo '/* eslint-disable */' > dist/bundle.js && browserify ./es2015/**.js | uglifyjs -mc warnings=false >> dist/bundle.js
scripts.copy: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; cp -r public/* dist; cp node_modules/hyperhtml/umd.js dist/hyperhtml.min.js
scripts.start: npm run copy && npm run concat-css && npm run add-script-dev && npm run serve
scripts.version: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
